caption: Nice😎

Hands down the best bagel store in NYC. In terms of price, quality & service they are unrivaled. A true institution. They train their workers really well and move pretty fast for such a crowded place. I also appreciate that they do not do call in pick up. As I saw someone complain about this. They are a small, crowded store, they work fast and hard to accommodate everyone.
LOVE IT😍 specially the bialys 🍩
Good and fast on the go breakfast... And they give you a sandwich card that after you buy 10 the 11 sandwich is on them... Way to go bagel bazaar...

BEST BAGELS.. good service except for that little short dark skin dude with glasses he has the napoleon complex he has the worst attitude and he's been there for many years. I guess they keep him around becuz he also bakes bagels on certain days and these days it ain't easy to find good help. Enjoy 😉
Best customer service ever. Own is amazing. They make the best bacon egg and cheese in Brooklyn!!
Bagels and breads are made fresh and so is your breakfast sandwich.. make sure u ask for a breakfast card.. your last 10th visit you'll get a free breakfast sandwich..  💕 it

This is an amazing place to buy bagels, you might not like when you walk in because its a bit old  but the place its worth  buying from  in my opinion this is the best place to buy your breakfast   in bagels and rolls  etc...
Great 👍
By far the best no matter what
Ppl putting hands allover the food with out gloves... Smoked salmon was slimy and fatty...uhgg... Definitely a skip
Unbelievable bagels 🥯
Best bagels ever
I ordered a bacon egg and cheese on a roll and they burned my bread.
It's everything you want at bagels store Steve is a very good guy and the rest of the guys
Best bagels ever!!!!!! Local or not, happy it's in my neighborhood :)
If you think New Yorkers are rude that's because you've never been to this place. Best service ever!

Bagels are great and the owners are nice. Unfortunately I saw them being rude to a woman who, though she  didn't wear a mask for her  personal reasons, she did  practice social distancing. She ordered her bagels, told the employee she would wait outside , when her order was ready  with no other customer inside ,she  came back in to pay when the owner told her that people are upset if she doesn't wear a mask.  The only one who ended up upset was the woman. We need to remember that some people just can't wear one .
Best bagels in NYC!
This place has. Even here for so.many years a must stop for breakfast I do every sunday
Meet bagel for st. Patty's day and for Easter
Great bagels and service is very curious also.
Best bagels

I have been going to this place for years with my wife. Their bagels are delicious, everything is made in house for the most part and the staff is super nice. I would consider this place a bagel institution because they have really nailed the art if making a bagel. Their sweets and pastries are delicious too! Highly recommended.
Food very good. Very Fresh and made with love
True local bagelry. They make real bagels. Nuff said.
Best bagels in Brooklyn or may be in New York. Been coming here for years.. Always happy faces and great quality. Highly recommended
Great place to order nice cup of coffee and sausage and cheese on a bagel sandwich
My go to spot for my mornin bfast
this shop has the best bagels - always fresh and hot right out of the oven

I have been going to this place for years and they never disappoint! Great sandwiches, coffee, and pastries! There bagels are always made fresh, they are the best bagel shop around! I will always recommend this bagel shop.
Its a great place
been a customer since past 20 years. always fresh and yummy bagels. our favs are the everything bagels.
Great place , owners are always there. The last real Bensonhurst establishment left on this side of 86st. Fast Delivery, Great workers and amazing Bagels! No doubt about it!
Awesome bagels
Absolutely the Best Bagels!! 👍👍🔥 Also very strong Yankee Fan's!!👍

I love this place! The staff are always very nice and work quickly. The food and coffee is delicious, and there are rarely any mistakes with my orders (which is cool since I place orders for some seriously picky people). Their bagels are always fresh and perfectly cooked. Its super easy to get to as well. I highly recommend this place!
Awesomely delicious bagels!
Food and Service is good and fast

Best bagels in Brooklyn. They may not have as many varieties of cream cheese/fillings but they serve classic bests. Forever about all those trendy bagel shops. This tiny place has been here for decades for a reason
Quality sandwich with great prices and also very friendly employees
Bagels are always fresh
Best bagels in NY 👌
My everyday stop. Love the food and the people. Best BEC in town.
Bagel is always fresh including the pastries
Good Brooklyn bagel
Best coffee in Bensonhurst!

Always fresh always the best and #1 spot.  Been going since i was living in Bensonhurst moved to ocean parkway and i  still go!. Go here if you would like a nice fresh bagel of any kind. Thank you bagel bazaar.
Love this place..best bagels in Brooklyn

The bagels are pretty good for the neighborhood. The staff are a bit rude. They forgot something on my order. You constantly have to ask for napkins, straws. It feels like they’re doing you a favor to give you napkins. I don’t think I’ll go again.

Best bagels in town! Have been going here for around 10 years now! The only Bensonhurst feel left on 86st. Whether you place an order for pick up or delivery they always make sure your food is nice and hot! My favorite here would be a Bacon Egg & Cheese or Sausage Egg and Cheese on a Plain bagel. you might ask why a plain bagel , Bagel Bazaar produces there bagels right on the spot. The est tasting bagels and the best tasting bacon. If you don't like bacon or sausage don't worry there are plenty of options for you. Unlike most bagel spots I the area that have their bagels elibered Bagel Bazaar stands out the most! Friendly staff and amazing owners that are there everyday! That's something I look for in a business. Better than bagel chief! I would recommend bagel Bazaar to everyone! Enjoy it while it's still around taste the real deal!

I would give 0 starts if I could. My first encounter with Hot Bagel Bazaar. I called to place an order for pick up and a guy on the phone told me that they were backed up and I had to come in in person to place my order! I always call places and place orders for pick up. No one has ever told me to come in in person because they were busy! It is not like I was ordering for delivery... I was gonna pick up! Right after I called Bagels Chief on Bath Ave and Bay Parkway (few blocks away) and placed my order over the phone for pick up. By the time I arrived to pick my order up it was waiting for me. :)
Fantastic. Steve always been the best bagel man in town. I wish in the place I live now (the Poconos) could be bagel place as good as Steve’s
Recommend it to try
- The Best Bagels on the planet.

Horrible service. Rude people. Went there for the first time and i was so disappointed with how they treat their customers. To top it off, we were waiting for our bagels and we spot a mouse on the floor, so close to the food. Disgusting. We took our money and walked out. Will never go back there again.
Bagels are not bad. Extremely rude people though. Looks like they doing you a favor. Many other bagel shops around. Won't come back.
fresh, clean, and respectful
Best bagels ever
Great bagels at a great price along with all their pastries.
Owner Patty is a jerk. But their bagels are good.
They give the best bagels in town!!!! I could buy a bagel from here everyday. The service is also good, the people are really nice.
Incredible, fresh bagels.
Fresh delicious bagels & pastries!
Best bagels anywhere !
Amazing place! Bagels are amazing, and the cheese danishes are delicious. I go every morning .
